name: Splat the Blob
description: Join Splat the Blob on a cute adventure of helping Wilbur the elephant. Unlock new skills and zones by tackling obstacles and climbing to the top of the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
